content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, while I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Duisburg, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price during this negotiation. To initiate our conversation, I propose a starting price of 1250 Euros per month. How does that sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your proposal. However, I have been looking at similar apartments in the area, and based on my research, I believe that 1200 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation is higher than the suggested price due to the apartment's prime location and features.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that the location is exceptional. However, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the current real estate market, I believe that 1150 Euros per month would be more appropriate.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: After considering your input, I agree to the price of 1175 Euros per month for the rental of this unfurnished apartment in the city center with its excellent location and amenities close by. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
